LanguageData.StreamKit.Settings.Pages.Points.Descript: Whether viewer will have an unlimited amount of points. This is generally not recommended.
Whether viewers periodically earn points for interacting with the mod.
The amount of points viewers will start off with when they first interact with the mod, or their data is reset.
The amount of time that must pass by before viewers will receive points.
The amount of points viewers will receive when points are distributed by the mod.
Whether viewers will have to interact with the mod, at least once, in order to receive points at the end of a distribution cycle.
Whether the balances of inactive viewers will slowly decay as they remain inactive.
The period of time that must pass before a viewer's income will start to decay.
A percentage indicating the amount of points a viewer will lose when they aren't actively participating in chat. This setting does work in-tandem with a fixed decay amount.
A fixed amount of points viewers will ose when they aren't actively participating in chat. This setting does work in-tandem with a decay percentage.
Whether point distribution will be broken up into tiers viewers slowly progress through as they interact with the mod.
Whether viewers will receive special rewards for interacting with the mod.
